title: Cyclic Monopoles
abstract: We study charge k SU(2) BPS monopoles which are symmetric under the cyclic group of order k. Approximate twistor data (spectral curves and Nahm data) is constructed using a new technique based upon a Painleve analysis of Nahm's equation around a pole. With this data both analytical and numerical approximate ADHMN constructions are performed to study the zeros of the Higgs field and the monopole energy densities. The results describe, via the moduli space approximation, a novel type of low energy k monopole scattering.
